    "../externals/dng_sdk/source/dng_xy_coord.h"
)

include_directories(
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/third_party/externals/libjpeg-turbo
)

add_definitions(
    -DqDNGBigEndian=0
    -DqDNGReportErrors=0
    -DqDNGThreadSafe=1
    -DqDNGUseLibJPEG=1
    -DqDNGUseXMP=0
    -DqDNGValidate=0
    -DqDNGValidateTarget=1
    -DUNIX_ENV=1
)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SOURCES})
